channel.title: Manual on Mr. Abar
channel.description: Recent content in Manual on Mr. Abar

item.title: Running manual Cucumber tests in Java
item.description: In theory, it would be nice to have everything automated. In reality, it might be the case that for some reasons you have to run and manually verify test results. There can be a number of ways for running manual Cucumber tests, for Ruby there’s even whole CukeHub to run and organize manual tests, but my research yielded no results on how to do manual testing in Java. So, let’s implement it our self.
